lines: rama ke parichiton mein ek ramesh baaboo myoonisipal bord mein hed klark the
umr to chaalees ke oopar thee par the bade rasik
shataranj khelane baith jaate to savera kar dete
daphtar bhee bhool jaate
na aage naath na peechhe pagaha
javaanee mein stree mar gaee thee doosara vivaah nahin kiya
us ekaant jeevan mein siva vinod ke aur kya avalamb tha
chaahate to hazaaron ke vaarenyaare karate par rishvat kee kaudee bhee haraam samajhate the
rama se bada sneh rakhate the
aur kaun aisa nithalla tha jo raatraat bhar unase shataranj khelata
aaj kaee din se bechaare bahut vyaakul ho rahe the
shataranj kee ek baajee bhee na huee
akhabaar kahaan tak padhate
rama idhar doek baar aaya avashy par bisaat par na baitha ramesh baaboo ne muhare bichha die
usako pakadakar baithaaya par vah baitha nahin
vah kyon shataranj khelane laga
bahoo aaee hai usaka munh dekhega usase premaalaap karega ki is boodhe ke saath shataranj khelega kaee baar jee mein aaya use bulavaen par yah sochakar ki vah kyon aane laga rah gae
kahaan jaen sinema hee dekh aaven kisee tarah samay to kate
sinema se unhen bahut prem na tha par is vakt unhen sinema ke siva aur kuchh na soojha
kapade pahane aur jaana hee chaahate the ki rama ne kamare mein kadam rakha
ramesh use dekhate hee gend kee tarah ludhakakar dvaar par ja pahunche aur usaka haath pakadakar bole aaie aaie baaboo ramaanaath saahab bahaadur tum to is buddhe ko bilkul bhool hee gae
haan bhaee ab kyon aaoge premika kee raseelee baaton ka aanand yahaan kahaan choree ka kuchh pata chala
ramaanaath kuchh bhee nahin
ramesh bahut achchha hua thaane mein rapat nahin likhaee nahin saudo sau ke matthe aur jaate
bahoo ko to bada duhkh hua hoga
ramaanaath kuchh poochhie mat tabhee se daanapaanee chhod rakha hai main to tang aa gaya
jee mein aata hai kaheen bhaag jaoon
baaboojee sunate nahin

ramesh baaboojee ke paas kya kaee ka khajaana rakha hua hai abhee chaarpaanch hazaar kharch kie hain phir kahaan se laakar gahane banava den dasbees hazaar roopaye honge to abhee to bachche bhee to saamane hain aur naukaree ka bharosa hee kya pachaas roope hota hee kya hai
ramaanaath main to museebat mein phans gaya
ab maaloom hota hai kaheen naukaree karanee padegee
chain se khaate aur mauj udaate the nahin to baithebaithae is maayaajaal mein phanse
ab batalaie hai kaheen naukareechaakaree ka sahaara
ramesh ne taak par se muhare aur bisaat utaarate hue kaha aao ek baajee ho jae phir is maamale ko sochen ise jitana aasaan samajh rahe ho utana aasaan nahin hai
achchheachchhe dhakke kha rahe hain
ramaanaath mera to is vakt khelane ko jee nahin chaahata
jab tak yah prashn hal na ho jaay mere hosh thikaane nahin honge
ramesh baaboo ne shataranj ke muhare bichhaate hue kaha aao baitho
ek baar to khel lo phir sochen kya ho sakata hai
ramaanaath zara bhee jee nahin chaahata main jaanata ki sir mudaate hee ole padenge to main vivaah ke nazadeek hee na jaata
ramesh ajee dochaar chaalen chalo to aapheeaap jee lag jaayaga
zara akl kee gaanth to khule
baazee shuroo huee
kaee maamoolee chaalon ke baad ramesh baaboo ne rama ka rookh peet liya
ramaanaath oh kya galatee huee
ramesh baaboo kee aankhon mein nashe keesee laalee chhaane lagee
shataranj unake lie sharaab se kam maadak na tha
bole bohanee to achchhee huee tumhaare lie main ek jagah soch raha hoon
magar vetan bahut kam hai keval tees roopaye
vah rangee daadhee vaale khaan saahab nahin hain unase kaam nahin hota
tumhaare laayak to vah jagah nahin hai chaaho to kar lo
yah kahatekahate rama ka pheela maar liya
rama ne pheele ko phir uthaane kee cheshta karake kaha aap mujhe baaton mein lagaakar mere muhare udaate jaate hain isakee sanad nahin lao mera pheela
ramesh dekho bhaee beeemaanee mat karo
mainne tumhaara pheela jabaradastee to nahin uthaaya
haan to tumhen vah jagah manjoor hai
ramaanaath vetan to tees hai
ramesh haan vetan to kam hai magar shaayad aage chalakar badh jae
meree to raay hai kar lo
ramaanaath achchhee baat hai aapakee salaah hai to kar loonga
ramesh jagah aamadanee kee hai
miyaan ne to usee jagah par rahate hue ladakon ko eme elelbee kara liya
do kolej mein padhate hain
ladakiyon kee shaadiyaan achchhe gharon mein keen
haan zara samajhboojhakar kaam karane kee jaroorat hai
ramaanaath aamadanee kee mujhe parava nahin rishvat koee achchhee cheez to hai nahin
ramesh bahut kharaab magar baalbachchon vaale aadamee kya karen
tees roopayon mein guzar nahin ho sakatee
main akela aadamee hoon
mere lie dedh sau kaaphee hain
kuchh bacha bhee leta hoon lekin jis ghar mein bahut se aadamee hon ladakon kee padhaee ho ladakiyon kee shaadiyaan hon vah aadamee kya kar sakata hai
jab tak chhotechhote aadamiyon ka vetan itana na ho jaega ki vah bhalamanasee ke saath nirvaah kar saken tab tak rishvat band na hogee
yahee roteedaal gheedoodh to vah bhee khaate hain
phir ek ko tees roopaye aur doosare ko teen sau roope kyon dete ho rama ka pharjee pit gaya ramesh baaboo ne bade zor se kahakaha maara
rama ne rosh ke saath kaha agar aap chupachaap khelate hain to khelie nahin main jaata hoon
mujhe baaton mein lagaakar saare muhare uda lie
yah leejie shah to tum kal arjee de do
ummeed to hai tumhen yah jagah mil jaegee magar jis din jagah mile mere saath raatbhar khelana hoga
ramaanaath aap to do hee maaton mein rone lagate hain
ramesh ajee vah din gae jab aap mujhe maat diya karate the
aajakal chandrama balavaan hain
ramaanaath jee to chaahata hai doosaree baazee maat dekar jaoon magar der hogee
ramesh der kya hogee
abhee to nau baje hain
khel lo dil ka aramaan nikal jaay
yah shah aur maat
ramaanaath achchha kal kee rahee
kal lalakaar kar paanch maaten na dee hon to kahiega
ramesh ajee jao bhee tum mujhe kya maat doge himmat ho to abhee sahee
ramaanaath achchha aaie aap bhee kya kahenge magar main paanch baaziyon se kam na kheloonga
ramesh paanch nahin tum das khelo jee
raat to apanee hai
to chalo phir khaana kha len
tab nishchint hokar baithen
tumhaare ghar kahalae deta hoon ki aaj yaheen soenge intazaar na karen
donon ne bhojan kiya aur phir shataranj par baithe pahalee baazee mein gyaarah baj gae
ramesh baaboo kee jeet rahee
doosaree baajee bhee unheen ke haath rahee
teesaree baazee khatm huee to do baj gae
ramaanaath ab to mujhe neend aa rahee hai
ramesh to munh dho daalo barag rakhee huee hai
main paanch baaziyaan khele bagair sone na doonga
ramesh baaboo ko yah vishvaas ho raha tha ki aaj mera sitaara buland hai
nahin to rama ko lagaataar teen maat dena aasaan na tha
vah samajh gae the is vakt chaahe jitanee baaziyaan kheloon jeet meree hee hogee magar jab chauthee baazee haar gae to yah vishvaas jaata raha
ulate yah bhay hua ki kaheen lagaataar haarata na jaoon
bole ab to sona chaahie
ramaanaath kyon paanch baajiyaan pooree na kar leejie
ramesh kal daphtar bhee to jaana hai
rama ne adhik aagrah na kiya
donon soe
rama yon hee aath baje se pahale na uthata tha phir aaj to teen baje soya tha
aaj to use das baje tak sone ka adhikaar tha
ramesh niyamaanusaar paanch baje uth baithe snaan kiya sandhya kee ghoomane gae aur aath baje laute magar rama tab tak sota hee raha
aakhir jab saadhe nau baj gae to unhonne use jagaaya
rama ne bibhadakar kaha naahak jaga diya kaisee maje qee neend aa rahee thee
ramesh ajee vah arjee dena hai ki nahin tumako
ramaanaath aap de deejiega
ramesh aur jo kaheen saahab ne bulaaya to main hee chala jaoonga
ramaanaath oonh jo chaahe keejiega main to sota hoon
rama phir let gaya aur ramesh ne bhojan kiya kapade pahane aur daphtar chalane ko taiyaar hue
ramaanaath main taiyaar hoon
vahaan se lautakar ghar bhojan karoonga
rama ne ek minat mein munh dhoya paanch minat mein bhojan kiya aur chatapat ramesh ke saath daphtar chala
raaste mein ramesh ne muskaraakar kaha ghar kya bahaana karoge kuchh soch rakha hai
ramaanaath kah doonga ramesh baaboo ne aane nahin diya
ramesh mujhe gaaliyaan dilaoge aur kya phir kabhee na aane paoge
ramaanaath aisa streebhakt nahin hoon
haan yah to bataie mujhe arzee lekar to saahab ke paas na jaana padega
ramesh aur kya tum samajhate ho ghar baithe jagah mil jaayagee maheenon daudana padega maheenon beesiyon siphaarishen laanee padegee
subahshaam haaziree denee padegee
kya naukaree milana aasaan hai
ramaanaath to main aisee naukaree se baaz aaya
mujhe to arzee lekar jaate hee sharm aatee hai
khushaamaden kaun karega pahale mujhe klarkon par badee hansee aatee thee magar vahee bala mere sir padee
saahab daantvaant to na bataenge
ramesh buree tarah daantata hai log usake saamane jaate hue kaampate hain
ramaanaath to phir main ghar jaata hoon
yah sab mujhase na baradaasht hoga
ramesh pahale sab aise hee ghabaraate hain magar sahatesahate aadat pad jaatee hai
tumhaara dil dhadak raha hoga ki na jaane kaisee beetegee
jab main naukar hua to tumhaaree hee umr meree bhee thee aur shaadee hue teen hee maheene hue the
jis din meree peshee hone vaalee thee aisa ghabaraaya hua tha maano phaansee paane ja raha hoon magar tumhen darane ka koee kaaran nahin hai
main sab theek kar doonga
ramaanaath aapako to beesbaees saal naukaree karate ho gae honge
ramesh poore pachchees ho gae saahab bees baras to stree ka dehaant hue ho gae
das roopaye par naukar hua tha
ramaanaath aapane doosaree shaadee kyon nahin kee tab to aapakee umr pachchees se jyaada na rahee hogee
ramesh ne hansakar kaha baraphee khaane ke baad gud khaane ko kisaka jee chaahata hai mahal ka sukh bhogane ke baad jhompada kise achchha lagata hai prem aatma ko trpt kar deta hai
tum to mujhe jaanate ho ab to boodha ho gaya hoon lekin main tumase sach kahata hoon is vidhurjeevan mein mainne kisee stree kee or aankh tak nahin uthaee
kitanee hee sundariyaan dekheen kaee baar logon ne vivaah ke lie ghera bhee lekin kabhee ichchha hee na huee
us prem kee madhur smrtiyon mein mere lie prem ka sajeev aanand bhara hua hai
yon baaten karate hue donon aadamee daphtar pahunch gae
